title: 820-01061 iMac 2017 4K grafik problem
message:
hi,
got the imac working like it should be but sometimes it has some graphical problems. i didnt found in the forum or anywhere else an issiu like that. so i replaced the mainboard.

now, yesterday i got again an imac, same board same problem.

so this should be a common issiu, looks like gpu problem but i cant belive that. did somebody hearde that already ?
